data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe the last time you were scared to try something new but did anyway. How did you get the courage to try it? What did you learn from this experience that will help you in life?
data.answer: I had an essay from my school, which asked us to find an early childhood center and observe its environment and how the educators treat children. It was a tough job for me because I had to convince the director of the early childhood center that what I did will not harm the children and will actually help the teachers there improve their performance. I first sought some advice from my teacher and had great communication with my classmates. These helped me a lot. This experience was meaningful. I learned that whenever you want to try something new, it will be better to talk with someone with more experience. （109 字）
